indiya widesha katayuthu amathini heta diwayinata*** ayawaye sahana labenne nathinam 1977 amathanna*** rathawahana pilibanda wisthara danaganima sandaha nawathama ee sewa 03k*** rata wenuwen jiwitha parithyagayen katayuthu kala ranawiruwan pilibandawa niranthara awadhanaya *** mathiwaranayak nopawathwa jathika aanduwak nathayi ejapaya kiyayi*** kolambaa waraye sanwardhana katayuthu thawakalikawa nathara karayi*** uma oya bahukarya gataluwalata wahama wisadum*** athurudanwuwan pilibanda athuru warthawa me masa madadi janapathita*** dumriya departhamenthuwe yakada thogayak wanchanikawa alewi kirimata sambandha waradikaruwanta nisi daduwam *** jathyanthara pasal niyamanaya kirima sadaha kamituwak***
